item.title: HP Chromebook Plus x360 Full HD Touchscreen Laptop

item.title: Acer Chromebook 315 CB315-3H-C4QE

item.title: Dell Chromebook 3100 30J93 Touchscreen Laptop

item.title: ASUS Chromebook C423 C423NA-DB42F
item.description: The ASUS Chromebook C423 is designed to deliver dependable performance and portability, making it an excellent choice for light productivity tasks and everyday personal use.
